General.Name: Zero One Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zero One Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a business information equipment agency and sales company in Taiwan. The company also provides IT management and performance monitoring, information security, infrastructure network, storage system, backup, virtualization, video surveillance, cloud service, AI big data, container and DevOps, remote application, hyper-converged infrastructure, business application software and consulting services, etc., as well as hardware solutions. In addition, it offers advisory services. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Michelle  Chin
